actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A resolution disapproving the final recommendations for the restructuring of the Southwest Limited Amtrak route as submitted by the Secretary of Transportation.

summary.text: Disapproves the final recommendations of the Secretary of Transportation for the restructuring of the Southwest Limited passenger route of the National Railroad Passenger Corporation.

titles.title: A resolution disapproving the final recommendations for the restructuring of the Southwest Limited Amtrak route as submitted by the Secretary of Transportation.
